sentinel.comm
Interface GlobalEventFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
GlobalEventFactoryImp
public interface GlobalEventFactory
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface defines a factory for global event factory implementations. It is implemented by the class GlobalEventFacotryImp to create primitive global event and composite global event on the server.
